p: Ultra-performance liquid chromatography- tandem mass spectrometry (UPLC-MS/MS) analysis performed on both infusion and decoction samples of Aphloia theiformis, Ayapana triplinervis, Dodonaea viscosa, Hubertia ambavilla, Hypericum lanceolatum, Pelargonium x graveolens, Psiloxylon mauritianum and Syzygium cumini allowed identification of 2 major families of polyphenols: phenolic acids and flavonoids ( Table 2).
